ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and now we have no one to intercede for us;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Now we have none to intercede for us,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and now we have none to intercede on our behalf,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We have no one to intercede for us before God
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “So now we do not have any intercessors.” (The believers shall have intercessors, the disbelievers none).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: so now we have no intercessors,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and we have no intercessors now,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: So none we have as intercessors.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Now, then, we have none to intercede (for us),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So now we have no intercessors
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:100] So [now] we have no intercessors, as the believers have, in the way of angels, prophets and [other] believers,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Now we have no intercessors) from amongst the angels, prophets or righteous people who may intercede for us,
